data.title: Courteney Cox Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Courteney Cox on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Courteney Cox including Scream, Scream VI, and more.
data.text:
The Prescott

Alexâs new company is putting her up at a new luxury apartment with full amenities and a list of high-profile residents that the family is eager to take advantage of, without her knowing. Phil is on a mission to review the restaurantâs famous sliders for his food blog, while Mitch and Cam sneak in separately to meet its most famous resident, David Beckham.

My Jerks

J.D. and Elliot must deal with a lousy bunch of interns; Carla forces Elliot to acknowledge the feelings of her suffering, ex-fiance Keith; the new Chief of Medicine takes the Janitor to task for his tomfoolery.

Death Stalks the Big Top

Part 1 of 2. In this two-part Season Three premiere, Jessica's search for a relative, long believed dead, leads her to the circus and murder under the big top.

My Last Words

While J.D. and Turk are psyched about their annual "Steak Night" festivities, they prioritize giving comfort to a dying patient and spend the evening by his side; the new Chief of Medicine continues to make things tough for everyone at Sacred Heart.
